tool_description: Temporary Disposable Email Address | Disposable email  is a service that allows to receive email at a temporary address that self-destructed after a certain time elapses.
name: Tmail
title: Tmail

api_list.name: View message
api_list.description:
View a particular message by id
Use the token received from /mailbox as authorization header  & message id received from /messages as path parameter.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tmail2.p.rapidapi.com/messages/61d096c5d9aaba03c45cd012"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tmail2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tmail2.p.rapidapi.com/messages/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tmail2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Messages
api_list.description:
Get all the messages received by email
Use the token received from email as authorization header.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tmail2.p.rapidapi.com/messages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tmail2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Email ID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tmail2.p.rapidapi.com/mailbox"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tmail2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
